DescribeProducts.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: region.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeProducts
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Limit": 5,
    "Offset": 0
}
DescribeProducts.title: Querying Product Information

DescribeRegions.document: Query the list of regions supported by the product
DescribeRegions.input:

Host: region.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeRegions
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Product": "cvm",
    "Scene": 1
}

DescribeZones.document: This example shows you how to query AZ information (Chinese Name of Availability Zone).
DescribeZones.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: region.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeZones
X-TC-Language: zh-CN
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Product": "cvm",
    "Scene": 1
}
DescribeZones.title: Querying AZ Information (Chinese Name of Availability Zone)
